settings.banner_desktop_content: To effectively use Eddie®, it is important to choose the right size.
settings.banner_mobile_content: To effectively use Eddie®, it is important to choose the right size.

settings.section_content: Eddie should feel tight but not painful. If you choose a size that is too big it will not work. Eddie is available in 4 sizes (A, B, C, D) based on circumference or width. If you select the wrong size for any reason, we’ll ship a replacement size for free.
settings.table_content:
*Measured when flaccid. Picking a size based on measurement is the best way to ensure good fit.
**The vast majority of men fit within A, B, or C.

settings.faq_heading: How do I find the right fit?
settings.faq_content:
We use two ways to determine which size you need. Either measure the base of your penis or choose it based on the condom size you've typically 
														worn in the past. If you experience frequent performance issues, consider a tighter fit.

settings.faq_heading: How do I measure the circumference of my penis?
settings.faq_content: To ensure the best fit, wrap a soft measuring tape or string around the base of your penis while flaccid. Note the measurement and see our side guide for our recommendation.

settings.faq_heading: What if the device doesn't fit?
settings.faq_content:
If the fit isn't right, reach out to us. While we don't accept returns on opened products, we'll gladly provide a replacement in a different size at no extra cost. 
														Just contact our support team for assistance.

settings.faq_heading: How should it feel when I'm wearing it?
settings.faq_content:
Your device should feel snug, but not uncomfortably so, like a firm handshake. We offer two tension band options for comfort and support. 
														If the red band is too tight, try the blue one for a gentler touch. Finding the right fit is crucial for effectiveness. Contact us if you need 
														help choosing the right option.

settings.faq_heading: What if I resize and it still doesn't work?
settings.faq_content: If resizing doesn't solve the issue, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. Contact our support team for assistance with returns and refunds.

settings.section_content: Eddie is the feel-good health device that works with your <br class="d-lg-block d-none"> natural physiology to treat erectile dysfunction.
